name: Iness Ben Guirat
description:
Iness Ben Guirat is a privacy researcher at Universit√© Libre de Bruxelles (ULB). She did her PhD at COSIC, KU Leuven, under the supervision of Prof. Claudia Diaz on Privacy with a specific focus on mixnets 

Iness has a keen interest in exploring the intersection of technology, privacy and their broader impact on society.
